Àtụ:Infobox television channel
ONTV Nigeria bụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nwere onwe ya nke dị na Lagos, Naijiria
Na-arụ ọrụ na ahịa mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na-ewu ewu na Naijiria, ONTV bụ ọwa mbụ na-ejide ọkwa dị ka ọwa TV Terrestrial kachasị ele anya na Lagos.

Kemgbe afọ 2013, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị na Lagos gụnyere Media Perspective ahọrọla ONTV dị ka ụlọ ọrụ TV kachasị ele anya na Lagos. ONTV na-agbasa ihe ọhụrụ nke telenovelas ise sitere na Ka sam Se, Alma Indomable, Punar Vivah, El Secretario to Tomorrow Belongs to Me nke dochiri Avenida Brasil (telenovela) na mgbasa ozi na-aga n'ihu nke egwuregwu EPL kwa Satọdee, Isi akụkọ Sporting nke OmniSports nyere, egwu na ụdị ndụ dị ka Hitz OnTV na mmemme Soundcity TV ndị ọzọ na mgbede jupụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV sitere na Funke Akindele's 'Jenifa's Diary' to Squatter, site na Adeth, Comjase, 23 site na Spider-Sport, 23thban House, Spijo.
Na 11 nke Jun, afọ 2015, ONTV malitere na DStv channel 257 na GoTV Channel 96, na-aga n'ihu na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ sitere na ọwa CMA Group ndị ọzọ na Dstv na GOtv bouquet.
